function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Overreliance on prevention as a method for mitigating contagious diseases","Impact":"Ineffective response to emerging threats and black swan events","Mitigation":"Adopting a new approach focused on identification and management of vulnerabilities and organizational capabilities","Technologies":"Advanced surveillance and monitoring technologies, predictive analytics","People":"Public health authorities, government agencies, and organizations responsible for disease control","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies, organizations responsible for disease control"},{"Description":"Overestimation of contingency planning","Impact":"Inability to develop plans for a vast array of scenarios, leading to inadequate preparedness for emergent threats","Mitigation":"Prioritizing identification and management of vulnerabilities, implementing flexible response strategies","Technologies":"Risk assessment tools, scenario modeling and simulation software","People":"Emergency response teams, risk management professionals","Owner":"Emergency response teams, risk management professionals"},{"Description":"Narrow focus on building barriers and fortification strategies","Impact":"Inadequate preparation for absorbing, adapting to, and recovering from adverse events","Mitigation":"Emphasizing the capacity to absorb disturbance, undergo change, and retain essential functions, structures, and identities","Technologies":"Resilience planning and management software, real-time communication and coordination platforms","People":"Critical infrastructure operators, emergency response teams, risk management professionals","Owner":"Critical infrastructure operators, emergency response teams, risk management professionals"}]}
